components.title: AWS Cloud Infrastructure
components.description: Multi-cloud infrastructure security controls for AWS

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Restrict network traffic to only traffic from vetted locations or resources (AWS)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: CIDR blocks allowed for network ingress traffic

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates security groups and VPCs restrict network traffic to vetted sources

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Protect data in transit using encryption TLS 1.2+ (AWS)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Minimum TLS version required for encrypted communications

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates load balancers and CloudFront use HTTPS with TLS 1.2+

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Require phishing-resistant multi-factor authentication for all interactive user accounts (AWS)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Require hardware MFA devices instead of virtual MFA

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates IAM policies require MFA for sensitive actions

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Manage and protect secrets using a dedicated secrets management solution (AWS)

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates secrets use KMS encryption and rotation is configured

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Implement comprehensive audit logging to track security events (AWS)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Minimum log retention period in days

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates CloudTrail and CloudWatch logging configuration

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

components.title: Azure Cloud Infrastructure
components.description: Multi-cloud infrastructure security controls for Azure

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Restrict network traffic to only traffic from vetted locations or resources (Azure)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: CIDR blocks allowed for network ingress traffic

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates NSG rules and VNets restrict network traffic to vetted sources

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Protect data in transit using encryption TLS 1.2+ (Azure)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Minimum TLS version required for encrypted communications

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates App Gateway and Storage accounts use HTTPS with TLS 1.2+

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Require phishing-resistant multi-factor authentication for all interactive user accounts (Azure)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Require hardware MFA devices instead of virtual MFA

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates role assignments use Conditional Access for MFA

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Manage and protect secrets using a dedicated secrets management solution (Azure)

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates Key Vault has protection enabled and secrets have expiration

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Implement comprehensive audit logging to track security events (Azure)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Minimum log retention period in days

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates Log Analytics and diagnostic settings configuration

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

components.title: GCP Cloud Infrastructure
components.description: Multi-cloud infrastructure security controls for GCP

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Restrict network traffic to only traffic from vetted locations or resources (GCP)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: CIDR blocks allowed for network ingress traffic

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates firewall rules and subnets restrict network traffic to vetted sources

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Protect data in transit using encryption TLS 1.2+ (GCP)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Minimum TLS version required for encrypted communications

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates SSL policies and Cloud SQL require TLS 1.2+

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Require phishing-resistant multi-factor authentication for all interactive user accounts (GCP)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Require hardware MFA devices instead of virtual MFA

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates IAM bindings use Workload Identity and avoid service account keys

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Manage and protect secrets using a dedicated secrets management solution (GCP)

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates KMS keys and Secret Manager have rotation configured

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Implement comprehensive audit logging to track security events (GCP)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Minimum log retention period in days

props.name: Check_Description
props.value: Validates Cloud Audit Logs and logging bucket configuration

props.name: Fetcher_Description
props.value: Conftest validates Terraform plans against OPA policies
